verbs.description: A group [V: has] urged the Trump administration to push for reunions as part of any summit deal .
[ARG0: A group] has [V: urged] [ARG1: the Trump administration] [ARG2: to push for reunions as part of any summit deal] .
A group has urged [ARG0: the Trump administration] to [V: push] [ARG2: for reunions] [ARGM-ADV: as part of any summit deal] .
